ej,martc002,P,evanj901,Charging mound ej,appik001,P,evanj901,Intentional HBP $Carlos Martinez was hit on the helmet by the pitch; he charged the mound but was restrained by HP umpire Jim Evans and catcher Brent Mayne; both benches emptied and a brief shoving match ensued; Martinez and Appier ejected by Evans; Martinez was kept in a hospital overnight for observation
Kurt Stillwell left with bruised left heel
